import React, {Component} from 'react'; import Back from "../../components/backButton/back"; import './gameGuide.css'; import LockedIcon from '../../components/map/assets/quiz-locked.svg' import IncompleteIcon from '../../components/map/assets/quiz-icon.svg' import CompleteIcon from '../../components/map/assets/quiz-complete.svg' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; class GameGuide extends Component { state = { showFirstScreen: true, showSecondScreen: false, showThirdScreen: false } toggleFirstScreen() { this.setState({ showFirstScreen: !this.state.showFirstScreen }) } render () { return (

How To Play

Walk Around, Complete Activities & Collect Points

LOCKED

Move closer to this activity to unlock it

UNLOCKED

Tap activity to complete it

COMPLETED

Task has already been completed

); } } export default GameGuide;
